Posts.EditableText: I actually think it would be a good idea to make a save for later game system. I've already saved the links of two games on here, and it would be easier if there were just a feature/system to do it.
Posts.HTML: I actually think it would be a good idea to make a save for later game system. I've already saved the links of two games on here, and it would be easier if there were just a feature/system to do it.

Posts.EditableText:
Like going to a game page, and click a button???
Sounds like an easy tweak...
But... why not just download it and play it later... (provided you didn't forget you downloaded it!!!)
Wait... I bet you mean on the Play section where there is a list of programs!!!
Click on the game that has your interest, and have the option of "flag for later" or "goto game page"...
Too bad they (the web administrators) can't capture right mouse clicks and add "Flag for later" to the dropdown list.
Or maybe a "Message me" function that sends the game link to your message box...
